answers.answer: What a good question! I wanna know !
Idk. I know my dr will induce you after you hit 39 weeks if you're having trouble breathing or something like that, but I've always hears it would only be done if necessary, like you said
at my hospital they won't induce you until 41
Mine wont induce unless you have hit your due date or gone passed or if you have medical reasons
My doctor also won't induce til 40 weeks cause she doesn't let you go past 41. But she wouldn't ever do it sooner unless absolutely needed.

I'm being induced the 6th if I don't go before but I have gestational diabetes and my baby had a growth restriction. I'm not going to say all but I think the more complaints you have the more likely they are to induce early. NOT ALL PEOPLE JUST MOST LOL
Well i was 26 weeks 3 to 4 cm dialated and my hospital ledt me in labour for 4 days before they induced me how pathetic talk about tired and painful

Your body has to be ready for induction to even work, they can pump you full of pitocin but if your cervix is hard and closed it won't put you into labor so doctors won't induce you. Also it's better for baby to stay in until term so most doctor won't induce unless its the best choice or mom and baby.
With me, my doctor wont induce until my due date unless there is a med reason for it.  I will be induced on my due date which is in 6 days if baby doesn't come before.

question: I see all these people talking about getting induced if baby doesn't come by 37-38 weeks. Can you just tell your doc you wanna be induced and they do it? I thought they'd only do it if medically necessary or if you were past your due date. Can someone explain this to me?
title: hows it work?
